roleset.name: worry
roleset.note: MISGIVING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6; verbal 'misgive' included based on WordNet. (from misgiving.01-n)
MISGIVE-V NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from misgive.01-v)

role.descr: part of self offering misgiving; transitive subject, in add to arg1

example.name: LV
example.text: Look at the records of all corrupt officials , and the local officials will on the contrary have their misgivings !

example.name: verbal rel: misgive; all args
example.text: Her heart misgave her that she had acted inexcusably

example.name: LV, args 1,2
example.text: My friend said , " There 's something that I wanted to tell you many years ago but never had a chance to do so . Meanwhile , I had misgivings about many things . My own salary , for example .
